channel.title: Groovy Gloves pack for hL2
channel.description:
Jokerine requested some funky pink gloves a few days ago so i made some.
But I had fun making them, so I'm doing a pack.
Here are the pink ones, complete with normal maps: ![](upload://q2JFUWkGWi3KGx6J5QIFn1x6iIT.jpeg)![](upload://1lCdhBCEzTva0O8JMDz59aMFuAc.jpeg)![](upload://vOtXGvuPox7D4G7YCtG8VAHsX02.jpeg)![](upload://bCqUQEVr5nqwrbPzPWpOkbP76Yq.jpeg)![](upload://yOOxZSdPo31FQoMZGuQTxD3Wtva.png) ![](upload://cCcq959F7HIwSPUbE40yESzo9cI.jpeg)
[b]SO, request any color/pattern you want, and I'll make them for you. They will be released in "Ramirezoid's Groovy Gloves pack" at FPSB when done. [/b]
[b]I'm only going to do about ten skins, so think carefully about what you want. Chances are I'll incorporate a similar few ideas into one skin. [/b] :fffuuu:
I shall take screenshots of each skin and post them here so you know what you're getting.
[i]also I'm gonna do a Crunk Crowbar, made of steel and gold.[/i]

item.title: Groovy Gloves pack for hL2
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Check these out. They’re a new non-HEV model and you can chose white labcoat-ish sleeves.

I’m only going to do gloves that are TRULY Groovy, like tron gloves and such.

If your idea is too specific (Like Metroid Call of Duty Nanosuit gloves and shit), I won’t make it.

item.title: Groovy Gloves pack for hL2
item.dc:creator: Dax
item.description:
Master Chef:

Which Combine does it apply to?

Any kind. You just have to match the model name with the default model.

NOTE For everyone that finds these forums, tries to download this, and doesn’t know what to do, here is what you do:

Step 1: Extract to steam/steamapps/Half-Life2/HL2

                          OR

If you are running a mod: steam/steamapps/sourcemods/The mod you have

Step 2: Open your CS_Enemy_Pack folder up until you reach cs_enemy_models

Step 3: Choose what model you want it for your Combine to be

Step 4: Choose your desired Combine’s model

Step 5: Copy and paste that fine piece of ass to steam/steamapps/half-life2/hl2/models (Or in your mod folder’s models. Either way).

Step 6: Go into your CS Enemy Texture folder and copy and paste the Materials for that same Combine skin you downloaded.

Basically, if all that was too complicated:

Copy and paste all models and textures of what Combine you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Groovy Gloves pack for hL2

Dax:

For the modern Combine… Best thing that your going to get for now.

item.title: Groovy Gloves pack for hL2
item.dc:creator: Dax
item.description:
Master Chef:

Yeah, although I am fond of the Mark IV HL1 gloves for HL2. I have several requests going on various sites for HL2 replacements, because MY definition of badass is usually the best

  • CSS gloves

  • Stinger replacement for RPG

  • AR15 Nailgun replacement for Xbow

  • Modern Day versions of Combine (I’m thinking similar to CT’s from CSS)

As far as I know, the gloves would be the easiest.

For the modern Combine… Best thing that your going to get for now.

(Please note: You choose what Combine replacements you want).

Not made by me, instead, made by Tokotoko.

Read full topic
